name: Sheraton Jumeirah Beach Resort

reviews.text: The Sheraton Jumeirah beach resort is a poor quality Sheraton I feel, if compared to some others like Singapore. The location is in the very middle of a major contruction site, and the smallish hotel is already absolutely dwarfed by its surroundings.
reviews.title: Not the best in Dubai, high price for poor quality

likes.liked: — close proximity to Dubai media city business district.

reviews.text: Taxi's have a difficult time finding the hotel entrance due to constructions going on; the hotel beach is quite sad strip of sand which nobody has bothered to landscape; the rooms are on the small side; the pool is tiny and much of the staff is not very friendly or well up to their tasks.
reviews.title: Brilliant hotel
Fabulous! Highly recommended
reviews.text: The front desk staff in particular deserve a notice for being rather unpleasant on occasion (obviously depending on who is on duty). Also upon departure the agreed room rate was hiked up and the staff member failed to put through my SPG (Starwood) points, so now I have to separately request them.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Out of all the hotels in Dubai one can find a much better place to stay than this one.
reviews.title: Bad customer service

likes.disliked: — Service from most staff & smoking allowed everywhere

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My mum used to work in Dubai and had suggested this hotel, we were not disappointed it was fantastic.
reviews.title: Poor service and dated

likes.disliked: — Service levels, very long waits for taxis,

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I read many reviews before visiting this hotel for a Wedding Anniversary holiday in early September. We stayed for 6 nights and cannot fault anything. Everything is so clean and the staff especially in the garden and beach area cannot do enough for you. It can be almost embarrassing how they pamper you.
reviews.title: One of the best hotels we have ever stayed - The service was faultless

reviews.text: Everywhere in Dubai there is building work and before we got there Iconcerned with one the location (It is the very last hotel on the jumeriah beach strip) and also the amount of building work being commented on. Taxis are very cheap £2.50 up to the Burg Arab and the traffic around this area was never a problem. It does not matter if you were in the main areas as you would still need a Taxi as walking anywhere is a problem with all the building work. Noise is not a problem and you could be in the gardens or on the beach sunbathing and you are not really aware of the building work.
reviews.title: The Three Sss (Sand, Sun and Shisha)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The sea was 31c when we were out there so very warm and we also saw no fish in the sea however the water is very very salty.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A week was about right and we saw almost everything in Dubai for now but that is changing by the day.
reviews.title: loved the hotel

reviews.text: Recommend going on the Big Bus (The Sheraton is the last stop on the route) and this is a great way to see Dubai with the hop and off service and frequent.
reviews.title: Amazing place - in more ways than one

likes.disliked: — Location was further out than expected, but not by much

reviews.title: great value for money
reviews.text: I stayed at the hotel from the 16 dec'07 - 20 dec and i found the hotel to be quite nice.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: i was staying at the deluxe room and found the rooms to be quite spacious and big for dubai standards..
reviews.title: Pretty good but with faults

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the beach is quite good..and with not too many people...
reviews.title: 4* Star Hotel in need of refurb.

reviews.text: the hotel is 11 years old and looks like one...it needs to be refurbished now and especially the bathrooms look very sad...
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: i would recommend the hotel only for its beach..i cant think of any other hotel offering such beach at this price...
reviews.title: Great spot

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is a really good base. It is down to earth and you don't feel odd walking about in shorts and t shirt even thought it's 5 star.
reviews.title: Fab hotel

likes.liked: — lots of greenery in the grounds

reviews.text: The breakfast is great and the meals in the evening are about £20 for all you can eat of a particular region's cuisine such as Italian.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, faultless

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is next to some building work but everything is in this area and we didn't hear it once.
reviews.title: Dont Be Put Off

likes.liked: — The Staff & The Whole Feel Good Factor

reviews.title: Nice hotel
reviews.text: The pool and staff are really friendly and the sea is so warm.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: They have a nice gym, a few shops for basics like sun cream and some cafes. The concierge is really helpful and will organise trips, cheaper tickets to some attractions and taxis.
reviews.title: Great Hotel with Great Service

description: A beautiful resort located on the white sands of Jumeirah Beach. Right in the middle of Jumeirah Beach residence 'Walk' with great shopping and dining options, surrounded by landscaped Gardens that boast more than 200 Palm Trees. A resort haven, which combines relaxation with accessibility, is perfect for all business travelers, honeymooners, families and holidaying guests.
